name: Cemetery (MerryArcade)
description:
Collect the leaves at the cemetery, but stay away from the ghosts that hunt you. When you pick up a graduate hat, you get temporary powers to hunt them for extra points. Every 5,000 points a fruit appears. Collect it to add another life. The three ghosts have different strategies. Learn about it to get an advantage against them. Catch the chicken for an extra life.

On a computer, use the four arrow keys to control direction. Press the I key for info, the P key to play and the Return key to pause.

On a tablet or phone, swipe the screen to control direction. Tap at the top to pause
